scripts.dev: npm run codegen && npm run deploy-local -- --version-label v0.0.1
scripts.dev:no-build: npm run codegen && npm run deploy-local
scripts.dev:nodemon: node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js --exec 'npm run dev' --ignore build/ --ignore generated/ --ignore data/ --ext 'ts,json,graphql,yaml'
scripts.dev:nodemon:no-build: node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js --exec 'npm run dev:no-build' --ignore build/ --ignore generated/ --ignore data/ --ext 'ts,json,graphql,yaml'
scripts.cd: npm run create-local && npm run deploy-local -- --version-label
scripts.prepare:RSK:testnet: NETWORK=testnet && npx mustache config/RSK.testnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/RSK.testnet.json docker-compose.template.yml > docker-compose.yml && npx mustache config/RSK.testnet.json src/contracts/contracts.template.ts > src/contracts/contracts.ts && npx mustache config/RSK.testnet.json src/blockNumbers/blockNumbers.template.ts > src/blockNumbers/blockNumbers.ts && node utils/backwardsCompatibility/scaffoldChangeBlocks.js
scripts.prepare:RSK:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet && npx mustache config/RSK.mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx mustache config/RSK.mainnet.json docker-compose.template.yml > docker-compose.yml && npx mustache config/RSK.mainnet.json src/contracts/contracts.template.ts > src/contracts/contracts.ts && npx mustache config/RSK.mainnet.json src/blockNumbers/blockNumbers.template.ts > src/blockNumbers/blockNumbers.ts && node utils/backwardsCompatibility/scaffoldChangeBlocks.js
